title: Name
description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the HL7 Forward Rule

title: HL7 Forward Application Name
description: HL7 Forward Destination Application and Facility name (Application|Facility)

title: Conditions
description: Conditions in format {SEG}-{Seq#}[.{Comp#}[.{SubComp#}]][!]={regEx}. Examples: MSH-4=FORWARD or MSH-9=ADT\^A28\^ADT_A05 or PID-3[.3]=PIDIssuer or PID-3[.3[.2]]=PIDIssuerUniversalEntityIDType
